Cool App
| |

  • iPhone X/Edition
    September 03, 2017
    On Tuesday, Apple’s planning on introducing three new iPhones. The most significant of these is the completely redesigned iPhone X/Edition, which will become the first Apple handset with an OLED display.

  • Apple Watch Series 3
    September 02, 2017
    No designs changes are expected on the third-generation Apple Watch. Internal hardware changes could prove significant, however.

  • Nuzzel: News & Newsletters for Busy Professionals
    October 04, 2014
    Nuzzel is a slick news app that lets you see what trending news stories are being shared by your friends.

  • FEverpix HD Wallpapers - Cool Backgrounds & Themes
    September 01, 2014
    Everpix – HD Wallpapers and Backgrounds has a large assortment of wallpaper options nicely arranged by category. Choose from abstract, nature, animals, cities, 3-D, and more.

  • Firefox Focus: The privacy browser
    July 12, 2014
    Firefox Focus is a special version of Mozilla's popular web browser that is dedicated to speed and privacy. It offers blocking of trackers that could otherwise compromise your device's performance and your online security. It also features a readily accessible button for erasing your browsing sessions instantly — no menus, just one tap.

  • Pixomatic - layer based photo editor
    June 09, 2014
    Pixomatic provides a simple-to-use photo editing tool for iOS devices. Cut out, replace, and remove image elements with ease.

  • Marvin SxS – eBook and comic book reader
    May 21, 2014
    Marvin Side-by-Side is a special version of the Marvin 3 e-book and comic reader. This app allows you to compare books in split view, manage separate libraries for shared devices, and works with DRM-free EPUB books, CBX, and CBR comics.

  • Enlight
    March 16, 2014
    Enlight is your one-stop shop for all of your photo-editing needs.

  • VUE - video editor & movie maker
    February 01, 2014
    Rather than shooting at six-second video raw, use VUE to add some cinematic flair to your video. With a simple interface that allows for quick shooting and customization, this is an app you want to add to your arsenal.
Cool App - 2014
